parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the desired line where the index begins at zero

title: IGtol.GetLineAtIndex
description: Gets the start and end information for the specified line.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the desired line where the index begins at zero

remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles:
[
lineType, startPt[3], endPt[3]
]
where:
lineType
= the
line type
startPt
[3] = the XYZ line start point
endPt
[3] = the XYZ line end point
